documentation.description: Changes the passwords of users in the native realm and built-in users.

username.description: The username of the user to change the password for

refresh.description: If `true` (the default) then refresh the affected shards to make this operation visible to search, if `wait_for` then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search, if `false` then do nothing with refreshes.

body.description: the new password for the user
